tasks.name: QA
tasks.description:
**Objetive(s):**

* Ensuring quality and structure of the translations

\
**Requisites:**

* Confirming and making due recommendations so the translation is well written and native speakers can read it as if it was originally written in the language
* Make sure it complies with the structure requirements outlined on the translation task
* Providing feedback (this can be one or two lines)

\

tasks.name:
The Permissionless DAO
Turkish Translation
tasks.description:
**Objetive(s):**

* Having [The Permissionless DAO](https://medium.com/token-engineering-commons/the-permissionless-dao-32fcaaaae5f8) article translated to Turkish

\
**Requisites:**

* Small paragraph at the beginning referencing the original article like this:

  “This is a translation of the article originally published in English on December 7, 2021. [The Permissionless DAO](https://medium.com/token-engineering-commons/the-permissionless-dao-32fcaaaae5f8)”

\
